title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra vs Google Pixel 9 Pro XL: A friendly but heated rivalry

content:

description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra may be the best Google Pixel alternative in 2025, especially with the software improvements.

title: Why you should go with Google
description: As Samsung debuts its new Galaxy S25, you should consider buying a Google Pixel phone instead. Gemini AI will always be better on a Pixel.
content: Samsung is getting ready to announce its new Galaxy S25 lineup on Wednesday, but we already know everything to expect. Long story short, we’re looking at pretty minor upgrades with iterative design changes and some new AI features. There will also be... [3767 chars]
